descriptionHtml:
Hevno Dovah, translated Brutal Dragon

Hevno Dovah is a powerful lategame warhammer, it is forgable if you have ebony perk smithing.
But to get Hevno Yol Dovah \"Brutal fire dragon\" enchanted weapon you must complete the quest Evil in Waiting in
Valthume, defeat Hevnoraak and loot his body to get it.
[youtube]6HMh0k5LbXo[/youtube][youtube]LbXODDFDz_4[/youtube]
[youtube]cIKsh07QkYc[/youtube][youtube]5PD8cwVN9Lg[/youtube] 


Some might argue about the stats so feel free to edit and change my mod at will,
it does a damage of 30 and the enchanted verison has the greatest fire enchantment.

Have fun with it and please take a look at my other mods :)
author: Christian Paskota
